name: vscode-pv-handlebars-language-server
description: A Language Server for Handlebars in Assemble(-lite) Projects
author: Mehran Behzad

P!VHandlebarsLanguageServer.showHoverInf.description: Shows links to documentation of handlebars helpers on hover.

P!VHandlebarsLanguageServer.provideCssCl.description: Provides goto definition for css classes to their positions in .scss files.
Provides completion for css classes in hbs files based on scss files.

scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
scripts.version: npm run pkg && git add -A releases
